explains: adv. 很，非常，很大程度上；竭尽全力地；猛烈地

sentences.en: Hendon moved on again, mightily contented with the answer--but astounded at it too.
sentences.cn: 亨顿又继续往前走，对这个答案非常满意——但也很惊讶。

sentences.en: He had given a mightily impressive performance.
sentences.cn: 他的表演让人印象极为深刻。

sentences.en: We have struggled mightily to win back lost trade.
sentences.cn: 我们已经做出了艰苦努力，以挽回损失的贸易额。
